short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: track em, block em, stick em in a stew

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Producto is a combination task tracker and website blocker. While your tasks are in progress, sites in your blocklist will be blocked preventing you from wasting time on distracting sites. If you want to procrastinate, you must pause the tracker, keeping you as honest as possible. Tasks are synchronized between this extension and the web application at https://producto.cc for maximum portability and convenience.

The task list and blocklist can be modified at https://producto.cc, along with a basic session logger.
